Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job.

Survive a vast, labyrinthian forest on the edge of a peaceful village in Etrian Odyssey HD, journey to a floating castle in the sky in Etrian Odyssey II HD, and be transported to an oceanic paradise and rumors of a drowned city in Etrian Odyssey III HD.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey II HD
summary:
Etrian Odyssey II HD rebirths the timeless adventure of the mysterious floating castle.

Build your own party from twelve different classes of heroes and climb through the Yggdrasil tree to reach the clouds and uncover the truth of High Lagaard.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey III HD
summary:
Etrian Odyssey III HD brings the timeless adventure set in Armoroad, a sea city facing the aftermath of a great calamity.

Build your own party of explorers from the all-new twelve different character classes. Descend the labyrinth that swallowed the mystery of Armoroad and the drowned city.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection: Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition version announced for Japan with a limited quantity of 10,000 copies available for purchase according to the site.
This physical edition Includes a download code for the Persona Characters DLC and a Nintendo Switch stylus.

Create endless adventures with the Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection!

Explore the rich beginnings of this RPG franchise with remasters of three timeless adventures that inspire players to go on a journey of discovery, mapping deep dungeons, and building customized parties for exploring and engaging in tactical combat. Play as the leader of a guild of adventurers, searching for rare treasures and secrets within the depths of a vast, sprawling labyrinth. Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job.

Survive a vast, labyrinthian forest on the edge of a peaceful village in Etrian Odyssey HD, journey to a floating castle in the sky in Etrian Odyssey II HD, and be transported to an oceanic paradise and rumors of a drowned city in Etrian Odyssey III HD.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Eternal Mahjong
summary:
Eternal Mahjong takes the hugely popular tile-matching game to new heights. Mahjong can be played casually to pass the time or with more focus to sharpen your puzzle solving kills. The game learns your style and adjusts to bring you a fresh challenge with each play.
Play this no-pressure free mahjong game at your own pace. This is a single player Solitaire style mahjong game, also known as Shanghai Mahjongg, Taipei Mah-Jong or Kyodai.

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial: Venrom's Assault
summary: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial: Venrom's Assault is a cancelled game for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Etherion Online
summary: Gear up! Become a prestige master in weapons or master a skill - join thousands of other players in this massive 2D adventure!

name: Ettrian: The Elf Prince
summary: Unravel the truth behind betrayal and reclaim your rightful place in Ettrian - The Elf Prince, an epic adventure of survival and redemption!

name: E.T.: The Extra Terrestrial
summary: Players must save E.T. from the government agents, scientists, and law enforcement officers that are trying to catch him while attempting to assemble a transmitter that will allow E.T. to phone home.

name: Eternal Roadster
summary: Eternal Roadsteris an exciting and challenging game that will test your driving skills and reflexes. In this game, you'll be controlling a high-speed race car as it speeds down a never-ending road, constantly changing direction to avoid falling off and failing the game.

name: Eternal Rising
summary: An eternal loop starts, where each beginning is a challenge. Constantly improve to survive in Eternal Rising, a rogue-lite and bullet-hell where you face relentless enemies that oppose you at every turn. Death is a constant, but with each new attempt, you evolve, ready to face a eternal life.

name: Eternal Rome
summary: A city builder that combines futurism and the aesthetics of ancient Rome. Lead your people into the future era by researching new technologies, creating modern infrastructure, and withstanding external forces. Make Rome an eternal city!

name: Ethereal: New Moon
summary: Take on the role of Valerie Alton, a young shut-in revitalized by a desire to find her presumed-dead father. With the help of her ghostly caregiver Theria, make friends and face dangerous spirits lurking in the world's every corner in this cinematic point-and-click experience.

name: Eternal Winter
summary: Variant of Mister Easter included in Lexibook's Disney Frozen Portable Game Console.

name: Eternal Survivor
summary: A fast paced twin stick shooter with roguelite elements. Trapped inside a dungeon room you must endure and survive.

name: Eternals' Path
summary: Eternals’ Path is a roguelike, tactical turn-based RPG about struggles and poor choices you made and had during your life that will haunt you in death. Incarnate anti-heroes through different places. Fight those who wander there, but also people you knew in your life with lots of grievances to share

name: Eternal Destiny
summary: Eternal Destiny (Or just Destiny) is a first-person shooter originally released on Risc PC (Acorn) machines. You play through a variety of Egyptian, High-Tek Japanese, and Manga-themed levels, discovering power cells and unravelling the story, which revolves around a Time Travel.

name: Etrian Odyssey HD Character Set DLC
summary: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Joker from Persona 5 Royal and Ringo from Soul Hackers 2 to your character creation options.

name: Etrian Odyssey II HD: Character Set DLC
summary: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Demi-fiend from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne and Teddie from Persona 4 Golden to your character creation options.

name: Etrian Odyssey III HD Character Set DLC
summary: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Nahobino from Shin Megami Tensei V and Aigis from Persona 3 Portable to your character creation options.

name: Eternights: Deluxe Edition
summary: Immerse yourself into the world of Eternights with the Deluxe Edition, including the base game, the official digital artbook, revealing insights into the development of Eternights, and the official digital soundtrack featuring over 30 tracks composed by Spencer Bambrick.

name: Etcetera
summary: Etcetera is a Yume Nikki fangame. You are "Innard". You must return a lost pistol to "Etcetera". You need to find him.

name: Eternum Ao
summary:
2D MMORPG game based on Argentum Online!

In this fascinating virtual world, each player will create a character with a unique race that defines their physical appearance and a class that determines their outstanding abilities. As you progress through the game, your character will learn skills that will influence his success within the world of Eternum AO.

The choice of your race and class will be in your hands when creating your character, allowing you to forge a unique path in this adventure. Additionally, your abilities will develop throughout the game, reflecting your experience, playstyle, and personal preferences.

Interact with other players and non-player characters in this fantastical environment. Trade, negotiate, forge friendships or take on solo challenges like fishing, hunting or fighting creatures. The possibilities are endless in Eternum AO!

name: Eternal Boys Side Project: Twilight Spica
summary: Eternal Boys Side Project: Twilight Spica is a spinoff visual novel game of the original anime Eternal Boys.

name: Eternal Doom IV: Return from Oblivion
summary: All maps are: (i) medieval-themed, and generally very large compared to typical DooM maps; (ii) non-linear and feature multiple paths; (iii) feature castle and fortress architecture, fights on an epic scale, and magnificent vistas. Maps 08-10 can be played in any order within the hub, and powerups & enemies are different in any given map depending on whether you play it first or play it after entering from another map. This provides additional replay value.

name: Eternal Afterlife
summary: Part of the Dream Mate series brought to you by Story Taco and Buff Studios, Eternal Afterlife is a modern fantasy romance game where you make the choice. Jump into a new universe that you've never experienced for a thrilling and seductive love story.

name: Etrom: 20th Anniversary Edition
summary: A point & click action RPG set in a dark future. Unravel the mysteries of a mystical artifact and your own identity as a fugitive. Explore sprawling cities, engage in epic battles, and navigate parallel dimensions in this immersive techno-fantasy adventure.

name: Eto King
summary: An online tower defense game using Japanese zodiacs to fight.

name: Etos
summary: A Pacifist Immersive Sim set in an underground city. Be slippery, be stealthy or cause chaos as you evade, hack and disrupt your way to the surface in this intricately designed fps stealth experience, where getting spotted is half the fun

name: Etaine: Magic Survivor
summary: Etaine: Magic Survivor is a top-down arena shooter survival roguelite game. You can eliminate thousands of enemies through magic or artifacts. You can also choose talents to shape different builds to strengthen yourself. Will you be able to survive when you against the thousands of monsters？

name: Ether @ Net
summary: Unravel the supernatural mysteries in Ether @ Net! As a internet technician, explore a Hong Kong haunted apartments, face otherworldly forces, and team up with a spiritual guide and haunted couple. An exciting blend of mystery and adventure awaits in this thrilling game!

name: Eternally Yours
summary: Eternally Yours is an 11-map episode that should work for vanilla Doom. I would say the levels work better playing from pistol start to avoid having too much for the next level, but that's your decision. Anyway, I hope you enjoy playing them as much as I did making them

name: Eternal Slumber Party II
summary: Eternal Slumber Party II (often shortened to ESP2) is a megawad for Doom II created by TimeOfDeath and released on April 16, 2018. Just like its predecessor, Eternal Slumber Party, it is a collection of maps that TimeOfDeath had previously released as standalone PWADs, or as submissions to larger community projects.

name: Eternal Damnation
summary: Eternal Damnation is an 4 level mapset for Ultimate Doom, where each map is themed after each of the 4 episodes of the original Ultimate Doom.

name: Eternal Battle VR
summary: VR Team-based Cross platform multiplayer game that is teeming with action, cooperation, and fun. Divided into multiple kingdoms, You and your allies will be conquering the Atlantis.

name: Ether Versus
summary: A VR card battle game based on Chinese traditional mythology and the Spirit of Kung Fu. You will play different Champions in the story and weave their journeys. Build your sorcery deck, rein in your creatures, and use all your techniques to triumph over adversaries on your path.

name: Eternal Vigil
summary: Embark on an epic quest to defend the sacred crystal from relentless waves of monstrous invaders.Harness your unique combat skills, strategically deploy your powerful turrets and reach your full potential to push back the dark forces. Will you rise as the ultimate defender or succumb to the shadows?

name: Eternal Summer
summary: Unmixing reality!

name: Eternal Damnation
summary: Conquer, pillage and determine the fate of a fantasy world in Eternal Damnation, a hybrid real-time strategy RPG that places the ultimate power in the hands of the player. Fight back against a dominant evil or destroy it and take the world for yourself - the choice is yours.

name: Eternal King
summary: Eternal King is a wave-based hack 'n' slash with deep, involved combat. Hone your skills against unrelenting hordes of monsters in a surreal fantasy world.

name: Eternal Sacrifice
summary: Defend against invaders with unique gameplay blending real-time combat & tower defense. Master soul-shifting & explore a rich universe with diverse characters for an immersive ARPG experience.

name: Ethereal Enigma
summary: Are you ready to take ghostbusting into your own hands? Find the elements to complete the ritual, and escape the room.

name: Eternity
summary: Eternity is a 2D turn-based RPG that immerses players in a world of fantasy and adventure. Heroes and players take turns casting magical abilities to clear rooms of enemies and receive randomly generated loot. Gameplay includes questing via a quest book, climbing the infinitely tall Dark Tower, crafting items and new heroes at the forge, building the strongest team possible with character management, and teaming up with other heroes in co-op multiplayer.

name: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero
summary: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero takes place at a gas station in Winona, Arizona. Rayne Williams is a D.I.B Agent sent to investigate the strange occurrences at this gas station along Route 66. Join the story through Rayne's perspective as she tries to fulfill her mission amidst the challenges she encounters on the station's premises!

name: E.T. the Extra Terrestrial: Digital Companion
summary: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial: Digital Companion is a game based on the classic 1982 film E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial. First, E.T. asks you many questions, like your first and last name, zip code, address, and favorite things. Then, a planner is set up that you can use daily. It includes a clock, a calendar, a clock, and a "To-Do List" where you can list tasks that need to be done. You can also print anything that needs to be remembered on the Game Boy Printer.

name: Eternal Reverie
summary: Dive into 'Eternal Reverie,' a team-based roguelike shooter exploring the mysteries of an eternal war. Solo or in co-op, navigate diverse planets, pilot unique ships, and customize with 80+ upgrades. Unveil secrets on branching paths to increase your roster and discover the truths of the universe

name: Eternal Struggle
summary: A game that combines hardcore platforming of classics like Celeste with mind-bending puzzles with lasers, portals, and many more.

name: Eternal Gem
summary: This is a puzzle and leisure mini game suitable for players of all stages, with a cartoon style of version Q that people cannot put down.

name: EternAlgoRhythm
summary: A 10-key rhythm game where both the notes you hear and the notes you play are procedurally generated. Tap and hold notes through eternal, ever-changing melodies!

name: Eternal Acid Rain
summary: This dystopian world, plagued by relentless acid rain, burdens players with the vital mission. To succeed, we must complete our assigned tasks while evading the ever-watchful AI.

name: Eternum Dreamland
summary: This is a third-person beautiful girl fighting zombie game. Elements such as shooting, changing clothes, and shelters are included. The heroine is a high school student in the countryside, in a constant cycle, looking for her former friends alone, and taking refuge in a small villa.

name: Etrian Odyssey Heardle
summary:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle but for Etrian Odyssey musics. Based on Joywave Heardle.

Each Etrian Odyssey Heardle is randomly chosen from Etrian Odyssey's soundtrack.

name: Eternal Liiivie: EP1 Liiivie - Isolated From the World
summary: One night, Ita and Margarcia escaped from the village and became traitors. Various mysteries and conspiracies hidden in the mountain village have also begun the prologue.

name: Eternity's Child
summary: An unreleased WiiWare Port of the PC game with the same name.

name: Eternal Space
summary: Eternal Space is a city builder and space exploration/combat game. Explore the Eternal Space, and manage your city while you fight pirates, or maybe even become a pirate! Keep your citizens happy, and collect taxes from them each year for a little bonus!

name: Eternal Vault
summary: Eternal Vault is an action/adventure game where you travel through time and space to rob money and precious unique items from their owners!

name: Eternal Reckoning
summary: Eternal Reckoning is an action-packed Metroidvania following the story of an elf taking their revenge for the atrocities of Ragnarok. Slay a wide range of dangerous bosses! Explore a world full of secrets and rich mythology-inspired lore!

name: Ether
summary: Ether is a puzzle game that makes use of the already implemented physics, but lets the player interact with them in a completely new way. Taking place in a world were gravity has shaped everything from animals to houses, and from weather to communication devices, the player is faced with different obstacles on her way through the game. To progress, the player has the ability to change the gravitational state of nearly every loose object in the environment using a stick. This stick can turn objects weightless, freeze them mid-air or have them fall back on the ground. Hoping to bring a brand new experience with the game play we have no intentions of leaving the visuals unaltered. The Source Engine is deeply modified to provide a vision of something new, a world that feels alive and different from what you have seen before.

name: Eternal Spring VR
summary: Immerse yourself in 'ETERNAL SPRING (長春) VR,' an animated 360 documentary that goes inside the world of a real-life survivor of religious persecution in China, adding a new dimension to the feature film that was Canada's official submission to the 2023 Oscars.

name: Ethel
summary: Immerse yourself in a unbelievable, story-rich mystery, packed with jaw-dropping plot twist, horror, and multiple endings. You'll need sharp observation skills. Solve tricky puzzles and navigate eerie environments without any hand-holding.

name: Eternal Puppet
summary: Immerse yourself in a world of psychological horror in ETERNAL PUPPET! Complete the pending tasks and survive the paranormal events in an immersive warehouse. But be careful, you are not alone in the warehouse. Get ready to face your worst fears!

name: Eternal Burden
summary: A puzzle platformer in which you play as William, a restless soul trying to go back in time to get rid of his burdens, symbolized by a metal ball chained to his body. Use the ball to your advantage to get over obstacles and to solve the physics based puzzles that block your path to liberation.

name: Etherrealm
summary: A rogue dungeon crawler with fast-paced live combat mechanics that are reminiscent of the classic souls-like game.

name: Etheral
summary: Etheral is a solo ARPG project that aims to be inclusive for those with limited time, while delivering an engaging narrative. Combat is mechanic focused and is Inspired by modern God of War and Hades, while sobering narrative tone is inspired by the Witcher and Song of Fire and Ice.

name: Eternal Void
summary: Explore the eternal void.

name: Ethereal Abyss
summary: Ethereal Abyss is a single-player third-person shooter with psychological horror elements, inspired by the Backrooms. Navigate multi-dimensional levels, solve puzzles with time-inversion mechanic, while resisting enslavement by your mind.

name: Eternal Strands
summary: Fight epic, towering creatures while blending magical abilities with an arsenal of powerful weapons to keep the world from crumbling in this third-person, action-adventure game.

name: Eternal End
summary: This is a space exploration game.

name: Ethereal Fracture
summary: An exciting fantasy Roguelike-RPG that immerses you in a constantly changing universe! Randomly generated dungeons, challenging enemies, powerful bosses, equipment, and abilities. Switch between old-school pixel art and modern pixel art as you unravel the mysteries of Ethereal Fracture!

name: Eternal Paradox
summary: Eternal Paradox is a mobile 4X strategy game with turn-based RPG elements. Gather resources, build armies and forge alliances in the player-driven world of Elysium. Compete for rewards within a unique seasonal system where progress is periodically reset.

name: Eternal Fate: A Journey Begins
summary: Old-school style RPG to enjoy a nostalgic tale with difficult and fair gameplay that is fully voiced.

name: Eternis: Death Match
summary:
Eternis: Death Match, the ultimate arena where ancient legends and futuristic technology collide in heart-pounding battles!
Choose from a roster of iconic characters like Cleopatra and Isaac Newton, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Engage in intense one-on-one duels, thrilling tournaments, and epic guild wars as you climb the ranks to become a legend in your own right.

Explore dynamic environments, hone your skills, and discover new strategies in this ever-evolving battlefield. With regular updates, new features, and exciting events, there's always something new to experience in Eternis: Death Match.

But Eternis is more than just a game; it's a living, breathing world shaped by its passionate community.
Join our Discord community to unlock exclusive behind-the-scenes content, participate in lively discussions, and collaborate with developers to shape the game's future. Your feedback matters, and together, we'll continue to evolve Eternis into the ultimate gaming experience.

Are you ready to write your own legend? Join us in Eternis: Death Match and let the battles begin!

name: Eternal Match
summary: A mobile Gladiator Competitive Multiplayer Game With character that inspired by the Greek Gods, you can Download it at Google Play, Soon be released at Steam

name: Eternal Light
summary: Animation System Visual Novel "Eternal Light."

name: Eternal-Time-Love
summary: Eternal-Time-Love is a unique blend of turn-based and real-time strategy, with simplified yet tactical gameplay; Rich science fiction story, special level design, simple high-contrast style, support for multilingual and classical music

name: Eternal
summary: Eternal is a first-person survival horror shooter where the player is trapped in a sinister mental asylum filled with terrifying entities. Your goal is to unravel the dark secrets of the asylum as you fight to escape this nightmarish place.

name: Etera
summary:
Immerse yourself in a boundless adventure at the heart of 'Etera,' an extraordinary journey through an imaginary world.

Explore scenarios rich in detail and complexity, where the thin line between reality and fantasy dissolves. Navigate through environments so realistic they seem tangible, yet surreal enough to capture your imagination with a unique blend of familiar and unexpected elements.

Every moment will mark the pace of your quest, influencing the plot and direction of your journey. Face challenges in a mutable timeline, where the past and the future intertwine.

Indulge in the luxury of experiencing the magic of never-before-seen worlds, where climatic adversities become either a precious ally or a insidious adversary.

name: Eternal Rain
summary: Dive down into the ominous world of Eternal Rain, a dark-themed Shoot 'Em Up game that throws you into a relentless onslaught against hordes of nightmarish enemies. Unlock new characters with unqiue powers and survive the everlasting rain.

name: Eternal Escape: Castle of Shadows
summary: This is a light puzzle game set in a vampire manor, inspired by the experience of playing the "Castlevania series" and combined with an understanding and reflection on vampire culture.

name: Ethereal
summary: Ethereal is a 3D platformer with "collect-a-thon" elements, featuring a psychedelic ambiance and a low poly cartoonish visual style. The player controls the character "Ego," who seeks to free himself from situations in his past lives to reach his final stage of enlightenment. To achieve this, he must collect orbs and special collectibles throughout the levels.

name: E-Tech Simulator
summary: Welcome to E-TECH Simulator, the ultimate simulation game where your entrepreneurial skills will be put to the test!

name: Eternal Fighters
summary: Dive into Eternal Fighters, a fast-paced 2D fighting game that blends classic arcade action with modern dynamics. Choose from a roster of ninjas and warriors, each with unique abilities, and master modes like Arcade, VS, and Online. Prove your skills and become the ultimate Eternal Champion!

name: Ether
summary: Help a Space Mercenary, Ether, complete a difficult scavenging mission in an abandoned ship. Explore 4 different biomes, each with its share of dangers, and escape a swarm of mutant space bugs.

name: Eternal Bonds
summary: Eternal Bonds is a challenging puzzle platformer where you switch between two characters to solve intricate puzzles. Can you and your unlikely duo escape the spaceship, or will you be stuck puzzling forever?

name: Eternity
summary: Eternity (ETERNITY.WAD) is a Doom episode replacement mod of eight levels, created by Bjorn Hermans and Holger Nathrath. It is a sequel to Serenity and was subsequently followed by Infinity, the third WAD in the series

name: ETea
summary: Help Glorbo master the art of making boba to satisfy customers and take down bosses in this unique blend of simulation and bobarista action!

name: Eternal Cocoon
summary: Eternal Cocoon is a horror adventure game centered around Olivia, a girl whose boundaries between reality and dreams are blurred. Olivia must choose her own destiny while avoiding danger and an onslaught of monsters to uncover her truth.

name: Eternal League
summary: In Eternal League, you'll embark on an epic journey through a fast-paced roguelike RPG that combines customization, strategic combat, and a unique session-based progression system that rewards your skill and creativity.

name: Eternal Ninja
summary: Eternal Ninja is a 2D platformer with puzzles and traps. Players learn from each death to progress through ingeniously challenging levels. It's a fun yet tough game, designed to test your skills!

name: Eternal Haunt
summary: Eternal Haunt is a first-person atmospheric survival horror game. Explore the claustrophobic labyrinth of Yuki-Onna's home. Solve dynamic puzzles, scavenge for items, experience haunting scares that shift and evolve. Can you endure the relentless cold and escape the chilling embrace of death?

name: Eternal Night Glory
summary: From the beginning, you've got all the cards. Now, command the garrisons of the Gate of Radiance to stop them from approaching.

name: Etrian Odyssey Mobile
summary:
The first ever Etrian Odyssey game was released exclusively for I-appli devices in Japan.
As of today, the game is considered lost media.

name: Eternal Glory
summary: Romance of cruel fate, fantasy otome game ‘Eternal Glory’

name: Eternal Prowl
summary:
After many years, you return to your hometown, but nothing is as you remember it. The streets are empty, familiar places feel distant, and the past seems to have faded away. The old school bus is your only clue, leading you deeper into a mystery that begs to be solved.

Immerse yourself in an emotional journey filled with forgotten memories and unsettling discoveries. As you explore an abandoned house, you’ll uncover hidden secrets and solve a crucial puzzle that reveals the truth behind the town’s eerie transformation.

name: Eternal Guardian Rubine: The First Fight
summary: ETERNAL GUARDIAN RUBINE -The First Fight- is a hair trigger 3D run-and-gun-and-sting inspired by many action games from the 90s, but mainly Sin & Punishment, Alien Soldier, Cannon Spike, and Radiant Silvergun. You as the bio-mechanical superweapon Rubine must use your entire arsenal to blast through various overstimulating levels across multiple small scenarios while racking up the biggest high score you can.

name: Eternal Odyssey
summary: Eternal Odyssey it's Sunsoft’s JPN translation of GameOne’s Hong Kong-created PC RPG ''Eternal Saga''.

name: Etherburn
summary: Etherburn is a Souls-like action-adventure. Play as a hero resurrected in a mysterious and interconnected dungeon. Explore and face intense duels as you fight your way to freedom.

name: Eternal Labyrinth
summary: Battle through procedurally generated dungeons filled with hordes of monstrous foes. Arm yourself with an arsenal of ever-evolving weapons and recruit legendary Heroes. Each dungeon grows more treacherous as you push deeper into the unknown.

name: Eternal Knight
summary: A Souls-like, player vs. environment medieval, survival horror game with a high level of difficulty, a world and creatures set in dark fantasy, and a story told through environmental storytelling. Players use medieval weapons and magic to stop a powerful monarch fallen into madness.

name: Eternal Tree
summary: "Eternal Tree" is a turn-based combat role-playing game that tells the story of a journey spanning the Divine Era and the modern age. A grand epic, unknown challenges, and the continent of Titalyera await your exploration. Your adventure will shape the future of this world.

name: Eto
summary: Balance between tactics and luck as you lead your troops across various skirmishes! This tabletop turn-based strategy game will peak your interest as you try to clear all levels in this WW2 inspired setting.

name: Eternal Night Town
summary: Eternal Night Town is a horror game. Protagonist Xu Fan unexpectedly got a lawyer's letter about his great - aunt's inheritance. Curious, he went to her hometown. In the village, the people seemed oddly strange. Then, he entered a journey he couldn't escape.

name: EthnoGuessr
summary: Browser-based ethnicity guessing game.

name: Eternal Survival
summary: Eternal Survival is a Horde Survival game, where you enter and level up taking power and destroying enemies, collecting gold to buy more passive power to your character and can participate on hardest runs

name: Eternal Palace Sakura
summary: "Eternal Palace Sakura" is a rogue-lite 3D action game where you power up your character and take on thrilling dungeon challenges packed with flashy combat. Step into the shoes of Retla, a brown-skinned, cat-eared dual-wielder, and explore the ever-shifting dream labyrinth!

name: Ethereal Odyssey
summary:
Ethereal Odyssey is challenging 2D action-adventure platformer with non-linear exploration, rewarding curiosity and discovery, where secrets in every corner.

A lost boy awakens. The world around him shifts, twisting between the real and the imagined.

The world was once a dream is now a prison, shifting with every step. What waits beyond the veil? A forgotten past, an unseen presence, or something far more dangerous?

name: Etherlords
summary: Immerse yourself in Etherlords, a marvelous fantasy universe where the Vitals, Kinets, and Chaots are locked in a deadly confrontation for the world’s most vital and important resource. Crush your enemies, collect and evolve your creatures, and discover new strategies to dominate in PvP battles and daily tournaments.

name: Eternal Siege
summary: Eternal Siege is a tower defense game based around resource management, efficient use of spells, upgrading systems, and (hopefully) building some towers. Start in the Ancient Greek era, and develop a strategy to survive the human extinction to battle for the top of the leaderboard.

name: Eternity Warriors 3
summary: The most acclaimed action/RPG game returns with 3x the Heroes, 3x the Dungeons and 3x the Loot!!

name: Eternal Link
summary: An epic medieval fantasy adventure with exploration and action.

name: Eternal Exile: Beneath the Darkness
summary: A dark fantasy shooter where the dead know no rest. Journey through nightmarish dimensions where survival hinges on magic and firepower. Every upgrade, spell, and choice leads to salvation or demise. Uncover the truth… or let it consume you.

name: Etiquette Elegance
summary: Welcome to Etiquette Elegance – a stylish and atmospheric waiter simulator set in a retro-futuristic restaurant! Your task is to flawlessly set the tables, taking into account all the intricacies of restaurant etiquette and the unique preferences of your guests.

name: Eternal Affairs
summary: Recover a stolen artifact and lose your heart as a secret magical agent! Can you uncover an arcane conspiracy before the clock runs out? An interactive, text-based magical romance novel.

name: Eternal Night Metro
summary: A first-person, high-atmosphere horror game that includes elements of horror without jump scares. The main plot follows the protagonist, who, while working late and on the way home, accidentally enters a threshold space. Players must either find an escape according to the rules or stay here forever.

name: ﻿Eternity Warriors 4
summary:
Crush enemies and become a hero in Eternity Warriors 4, the latest addition to the hit RPG series!

Hack through enemies as the mighty Warrior, slash them with the lightning-fast Assassin or rain down fire upon them as the unstoppable Mage. Choose which hero best fits your play-style and jump into the action!

name: Eternal Circus: Dancing with Missiles
summary: Become a nimble mech and defeat bosses while dodging a barrage of missiles in this top-down 3D dodge'm-up inspired by mecha anime and Itano Circus!

name: Eternal Hunt
summary: Eternal Hunt is a pixel art roguelite action game where you battle waves of enemies. Fight on random maps and upgrade your character with powerful weapons and outfits!

name: Eternal Hand
summary: Eternal Hand is an innovative narrative game that combines text and image-generating AI to create dynamic storytelling experiences. Unlike traditional visual novels with preset choices, players shape the narrative by freely typing their desired actions and dialogue, with the AI generating both story text and corresponding illustrations in real-time.

name: Eternal
summary: Make History. One man fights for himself. One man fights for all. Be one of the first to experience Eternal, an intoxicating journey into the nature of humanity. Eternal is a ground-breaking fully-animated cinematic masterpiece. 100% Compatible with Steam Deck Gamepad.

name: Ethereal Sunder
summary: Play as Eilayda, the Fairy Queen, on a quest to save her people from a deadly sickness. Navigate a human prison district rumored to hold a cure, facing ruthless criminals and tough moral choices. In this RPG, your resilience will be tested—will you uphold integrity or succumb to corruption?

name: Eternity
summary:
An unforgettable journey of discovery, hope, and survival, as you strive to unlock the secrets of the universe and pave the way for humanity's destiny.

By intertwining Exploration, Adaptive Gameplay, and Survival, ETERNITY offers a rich and immersive experience where you’re guiding humanity’s last fleet through a procedurally generated galaxy, and your “empire” is a moving city of ships. Every vessel is both a building and a lifeline. You’ll expand by salvaging and refitting new ships, exploit resources across systems, and face moral and political decisions that can shape the fleet’s future.

name: Eternal Hell
summary: You'll die if you enter a site that you're never supposed to enter. You have to run away from the monster. This game is horror game, you go to the hell and you adventure hell Each building is filled with eerie rooms with traces and stories of past residents. You have to escape hell

name: Eternal One
summary: Eternal ONE is a visual novel game of futuristic fantasy genre, learning about secret of the city while resolving various request of Lucio City.

name: Eternal Ex Machina: Hawz Krarace
summary: The legend said at the Hawz Krarace ruin have legendary weapon and the chosen one can pull it out!! You and your party member take the task and find them and become millenarians in no time!! But... Something... Not right...

name: Eternal One: Memories of Kumo Island
summary: After the Beta War, the abandoned Island #17 was reborn as the vibrant “Kumo Island” by the Kumo people of Motokumo. The Administrator journeys to Toa and Satona’s hometown, chasing lost memories and hidden truths. But what is really happening in Motokumo?

name: Eternal Hunt
summary: Isometric action RPG, where you embark on an adventure to slay enemies in order to level up and unlock different skills to grow stronger.

name: Ethernia
summary: 2D pixel art MMORPG with real-time combat, gathering, crafting, and immersive storytelling. Evolve your class, fight monsters, and discover if you're the Heir of Ethernia.

name: Ethics Empire
summary: Become the richest business owner in this strategy-based simulator, choose your playstyle trying to balance ethics and profits in this chaotic low poly world. Will you keep your ethical businesses thriving or will you let it all crumble down for a quick buck?

name: Eternal Voyager
summary: Eternal Voyager is a classic action RPG set in a universe overrun by monsters, spiders, robots, and freaks. Take on the role of a living weapon unleashed to stop the source of a catastrophic event that threatens to destroy all worlds.

name: Eternity Breaker
summary: Build your class, break the cycle. A 2.5D turn-based roguelike where the skills you gain become your class.

name: Etrange Overlord
summary: Join Étrange on this musical odyssey as she seeks to conquer hell in the pursuit of living her best afterlife.

name: Eternal Legend
summary: Eternal Legend is a turn-based tactical RPG that blends political drama and family destiny. Build your army, forge bonds, and wage epic pixel art battles in a world torn apart.

name: Eternity
summary: Nearly 3,000 real pets submitted by players await you in a realm beyond time. Find them. Honor them. Guide them home and build their paradise. This isn't just a game—it’s a sanctuary of love, memory, and peace. Some bonds never fade. Some names were made to live forever. Welcome to Eternity.

name: Etched Memories
summary: Be a cat and navigate the aftermath of an unexpected catastrophe in this one-of-a-kind action-horror adventure. Confront dangers within and without, forge bonds or break them, kill or be killed in this cat-eat-cat world. Build new memories through a heartfelt story that won't soon be forgotten!

name: Ether Void
summary: New York, the 90s. Detective Frank Miller investigates a murder in a grim metropolis. Your window to the truth is an old terminal. Analyze data, crack codes, uncover digital trails. Remember: not everyone here wants you to succeed.

name: Eternity
summary: You play as a man shattered by tragedy, desperate to move on. When a mysterious corporation called Exracon offers him a job, it feels like a second chance. But behind its walls lies a brutal psychological nightmare — where memories twist, reality fractures, and survival means questioning what’s real, and what Exracon truly wants. Escape your past… or be consumed by it.
